name: Gumma Dropa
description:
Play on your mobile phone. You can still play this on desktop/web but you'll be using your mouse. 

I rushed this project for my daughter's birthday so please don't expect clean code :D

Directions

  • Tap to jump
  • Tap to the opposite direction while falling to trigger air jump and change course
  • Land on platforms or collect items to earn points
  • Going out of bounds will end the game
  •  - Squash when bumping on their heads and smash when jumping towards them to earn additional points
  • Getting bit while idle will end the game 
  •  - Colliding with pterodactyls will disrupt falling

Platform effects

  • ,  - None
  •  - Restricts jump range
  •  - Increases jump range
  •  - Removes friction
  •  - Explodes after 2 1/2 seconds
